name: Vovik
description:
Character control

The movement is carried out by clicking the LMB in the selected direction. Use the mouse to rotate the character and do not let him touch objects with his head, landing his feet. Avoid fiery comets and radioactive waste.

Courage bonuses.

1. Double jump. During the flight, you can earn courage bonuses for each complete turn of your character around its axis. Three turns give you the ability to jump one extra time during the air. To recharge the double jump, you will need to land on a meteorite or garbage.

2. Grappling hook. During the flight, you can use the grappling hook. Its use is also worth three courage points and does NOT trigger a double jump recharge. Click RMB to launch your grappling hook. If your hook hits the target, you can always release it by pressing RMB again

Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 77
Thanks Evan King for the music
